data.title: Societies & Culture: Great speeches - Frederick Douglass: Learning Goals
data.instruction: Click on the learning goals to see what you will be able to do by the end of this topic.
data.subject: English

goals.point: Identify how the features of purpose, language, structure, meaning & significance are used in a speech.
goals.description: Learn about purpose, language, structure, meaning and significance and understand how they are used to make a great speech.
goals.heading: After completing this subtopic you will be able to:

goals.point: Examine the use of the Oratory rhetoric.
goals.description: Read Douglass' speech and understand how he uses the Oratory rhetoric.
goals.heading: After completing this subtopic you will be able to:
